Html:
Hi,

I can't get the demo to run.  Is it because I'm using the Jan. 2009 WPF Toolkit?  I get errors about not finding the VisualStateManager, and if I fix that, it says VSM doesn't have a property VisualStateGroups (which it doesn't seem to have anymore..).

Thanks
Andy

UPDATE:  Opps... forgot to let the demo use the latest version of the WPFToolkit as well.  All if fine now.
